TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataObjectSettingDataEventArgs extends System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.SettingData> event occurs as part of a copy command or a drag command, once for each of the data formats to be added to the associated data object. Typically, this event is connected to a content control such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.IDataObject dataObject, string format) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject"> to which a new data format is being added.
A string specifying the new data format that is being added to the accompanying data object. See the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataFormats"> class for a set of predefined data formats.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject"> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.SettingData> event.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject"> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.SettingData> event.

Docs.summary: Gets a string specifying the new data format that is being added to the accompanying data object.
Docs.value: A string specifying the new data format that is being added to the accompanying data object.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
